instructions: Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 1 1 Open your Android s Settings. It s the Image titled Android7settings.png icon that s usually in the app drawer. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 2 2 Scroll down and tap . It s near the bottom of the menu. This option may also be called About this device or About this phone . Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 3 3 Locate the Build number option. This may appear on the current screen, but if it doesn t, it s hiding in another menu. It may be under Software information or More on some Androids. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 4 4 Tap 7 times. You can stop tapping once you see the message You are a developer now. This brings you to the Developer Options screen. If you are brought back to Settings, scroll down and tap Developer options under the System header. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 5 5 Tap . A list of apps will appear. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 6 6 Tap the app you don t want to start automatically. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 7 7 Tap . The selected app will stop and will usually not restart automatically. If this method does not work for you, try another method. Advertisement

Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 8 1 Open your Android s Settings. It s the Image titled Android7settings.png icon that s usually in the app drawer. If you have Marshmallow or later, you might have apps that start randomly due to a lack of battery optimization. This method helps optimize apps so they stop starting automatically. [1] Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 9 2 Scroll down and tap . It s under the Device header. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 10 3 Tap . A menu will appear. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 11 4 Tap . If any apps appear in this list, they may be starting automatically and wasting your battery. If you don t see the app you re looking for, try another method. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 12 5 Tap the app you want to stop opening automatically. A pop-up menu will appear. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 13 6 Select Optimize and tap . This app should no longer start automatically. Advertisement

Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 14 1 Search for startup manager free in the Play Store. This is a free app that allows you to customize which apps start up when you boot your rooted Android. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 15 2 Tap . It s the black icon with a blue clock inside. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 16 3 Tap . The app will now install on your phone or tablet. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 17 4 Open Startup Manager and tap . This is to give the app root access. You should now see a list of all apps configured to start automatically. Image titled Prevent Apps from Auto Starting on Android Step 18 5 Tap the blue button next to the app you want to disable. The button will turn gray, which means the app will no longer start automatically. Advertisement
